name: One of Us (LD33)
description:
Z - Jump
X - Action
(Caution: This game is FAIRLY hard.)

Made by two guys, the first Ludum Dare entry for both of us!
The idea was to have the player be the only human in a society of monsters but keeping it a secret, and then... I don't know what happened, it was Brett's fault.

It's not very optimized, so it might not run smoothly unless your computer is beefy. Chrome seems to run better than Firefox.

Windows version requires OpenAL to be installed.


All music made by Sicilica's keyboard and all sounds made by BenignBrett's mouth.
